articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Despite a relatively uneventful week in coin markets, several big crypto adoption stories hit the press.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Unmoved, Musk Makes Dogecoin Noise

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: El Salvador President Nayib Bukele’s Bitcoin bet is not popular with everyone in the country.
articles.title: Give Your Bitcoin to the Poor, Salvadoran Economist Urges Nayib Bukele

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Australian computer scientist who claims to have created Bitcoin suggests he might get litigious with one of the biggest tech companies on the planet.
articles.title: Craig Wright Hints Apple May Be Violating Copyright by Storing Bitcoin White Paper

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: Ethereum's next big upgrade will enable withdrawals of staked ETH, but heavy demand could drag out the process.
articles.title: Staked Ethereum Withdrawals Could Take Weeks After Shanghai Upgrade: Analyst

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The chatbot says a prominent law professor committed sexual assault during a trip he never took.
articles.title: ChatGPT Wrongly Accuses Law Professor of Sexual Assault

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Web3 project uses Metamask and other wallets to create an encrypted chatbot.
articles.title: Push Protocol Launches Privacy-Focused ChatGPT Clone

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: SBI Crypto alleges that Riot-owned data center Whinstone fraudulently misrepresented its capacity to host large-scale mining operations.
articles.title: SBI Crypto Sues Riot Blockchain-Owned Data Center for Fraud, Negligence

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: High-level diplomats have urged the global community to ensure the repatriation of all North Korean nationals working abroad.
articles.title: North Korea's ‘Malicious Cyber Activities’ Deeply Concerning, Say US, Japan, South Korea: Report

articles.author: Kade Garrett
articles.description: Doing your crypto taxes can be a lot less stressful if you know how to minimize your tax burden.
articles.title: Which Crypto Transactions Are NOT Taxable? How To Minimize Your Crypto Taxes

articles.description: Web3 gaming YouTuber CryptoStache talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA about why Web3 gaming will bring NFTs mainstream, the partnerships that prove it's already happening, how gamers will change their tune on NFTs, and how the terminology is likely to change.
articles.title: Web3 YouTuber CryptoStache: Gaming Will Be the Catalyst That Takes NFTs Mainstream

articles.description: Steve H., VP of sales from Fordefi, which raised $18 million in funding last year, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA how Fordefi uses multi-party computation to make signing transactions on an institutional crypto wallet much simpler—no seed phrase needed.
articles.title: Fordefi Aims to Dramatically Simplify the Institutional Crypto Wallet

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The never-before-heard version of Bowie's hit "Let’s Dance" will be sold via pay-what-you-want NFTs from Gala Music and benefit charity.
articles.title: Unreleased David Bowie Recording to Debut as Music NFT

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Meta unveils "Segment Anything" AI image identification tool, but the scale of the dataset used by the social giant raises privacy concerns.
articles.title: Meta Launches AI Tool That Can Identify, Separate Items in Pictures

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Doge had a very short run as Twitter's new mascot.
articles.title: Dogecoin Drops Sharply After Twitter Blue Bird Returns

articles.description: Toronto-based Bitcoin mining company Hut 8 recently announced a merger with U.S. Bitcoin Corp that will take it into Texas, Nebraska, and New York. Hut 8 CEO Jaime Leverton joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk expanding into the U.S., dealing with regulatory pushback post-FTX, why Texas is such a hotspot, and where she'd like to expand globally down the road (the climates may surprise you). Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Canadian Bitcoin Miner Hut 8 Is Heading West

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: ChatGPT chooses to include gold, not Bitcoin, as part of its "recession-proof" portfolio.
articles.title: ChatGPT Picks Gold Over Bitcoin, Says Crypto Critic Peter Schiff

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: After weeks of threatening messages, lawyer Adam Moskowitz says he fears that one of Bitboy’s followers might try to harm him and his family.
articles.title: Lawyer Says He’s Called the FBI on Bitboy Over Threatening Emails, Calls and Tweets

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Treasury Department said in a Thursday report that criminals do indeed use DeFi tools and apps, but most criminal activity still opts for fiat.
articles.title: Treasury Says Crooks Prefer Fiat to Crypto in DeFi Risk Report

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Shaquille O'Neal is a defendant in a lawsuit for promoting FTX, including Tom Brady and Larry David.
articles.title: Lawyers Claim Shaq Is Hiding From FTX Lawsuit, Seek Alternative Method to Serve Him

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: The seminal document behind Bitcoin has been lurking in an innocuous file on Apple computers for years. Here's how to find it.
articles.title: Apple's Hidden Bitcoin White Paper the Latest in a Long List of Easter Eggs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Interest in Ordinals is going strong, and now NFT marketplace Magic Eden looks to further capitalize on the latest Bitcoin craze.
articles.title: Magic Eden Bitcoin NFT Launchpad Debuts as Ordinals Total Nears 1 Million

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Aragon’s recently launched tech stack is now live on Polygon, dropping costs for spinning up DAOs and taking aim at voter apathy.
articles.title: Aragon’s New DAO Toolkit on Polygon Takes Aim at Voter Apathy

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Novel Labs and Faraway are developing an independent city-building game that gives new life to Yuga Labs’ Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFTs.
articles.title: Mutant Apes Take the Lead in Serum City, an ApeCoin-Powered Ethereum NFT Game

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Dogecoin has posted an intraday loss of roughly 8%, but it still has most of its Elon Musk-assisted gains over the last seven days.
articles.title: Dogecoin Down 8% as Musk’s Twitter Hype Fades

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The 1-year moratorium on mining would give county officials more time to better establish clearer standards for the activity.
articles.title: North Carolina County Mulls 1-Year Bitcoin Mining Moratorium

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Binance requested the cancellation a day before Australia's securities regulator announced that it would end the license.
articles.title: Australia Financial Regulator Cancels Binance Derivatives Business License

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The Environmental Working Group continues to rail against proof-of-work blockchains.
articles.title: Report Blasts Bitcoin Mining for Pollution—But Bitcoiners Aren’t Buying It

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Despite flagging demand for Alexa, experts say Amazon could still pull ahead of the pack.
articles.title: Has Amazon Lost The AI Race?

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The creator of the new protocol claims it is the “most permanent” means of inscribing data on the Bitcoin blockchain.
articles.title: ‘Bitcoin Stamps’ NFTs Are Gaining On Ordinals

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: In the wake of an outright ban of ChatGPT in Italy, governments are trying to balance innovation with protecting user privacy.
articles.title: AI Fears Grow as Germany, France, Sweden, and Canada Voice Concerns

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The state is a mining hot-spot, but a new bill limiting benefits got unanimous approval by a state Senate committee. Mining advocates are concerned.
articles.title: Is Texas Still 'Very Open for Business' for Bitcoin Mining?

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: One wants to resume operation of the marketplace, the other is directing users to an alternative service.
articles.title: Future of Paxful Bitcoin Exchange in Flux As Co-Founders Fight

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The Cash App creator also led Google's Android team and helped combat the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.title: MobileCoin Exec Bob Lee Fatally Stabbed in San Francisco

articles.author: Andrew Cohen
articles.description: Meta’s recent embrace of AI is only growing, with new plans for generative ads—and Meta’s CTO thinks AI will help power the metaverse, too.
articles.title: Meta Reveals AI Tool to Help Brands Target Facebook, Instagram Users

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The software company is still buying up the cryptocurrency—which has soared in value since January.
articles.title: MicroStrategy Buys More Bitcoin as Asset Nears Company’s Break Even Price

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Feature.io tapped “The Fast and Furious” co-writer Ayer to write and produce the project, which is billed as an interactive media experience.
articles.title: 'Lollipop' NFT Racing Game From Filmmaker David Ayer Coming to Polygon

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Developer Gunzilla Games and Neill Blomkamp will roll out the upcoming battle royale shooter via an Avalanche subnet.
articles.title: 'District 9' Director Is Launching a Web3 Game—With a Dedicated Avalanche Subnet

articles.author: Paul Krantz
articles.description: Bitcoin miners are quick to claim they're an asset to grids, while others suggest it’s not the best use of excess green energy. Which is it?
articles.title: Batteries or Bitcoin: Is Mining the Best Use for ‘Excess’ Green Energy?

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The CoinFLEX founder offered Ver and Blockchain.com’s CEO two years of free trading on OPNX should they settle their debts.
articles.title: CoinFLEX Founder Offers Bitcoin Evangelist Roger Ver ‘Olive Branch’ to Settle Alleged $84M Debt

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: PostFinance is rolling out a range of crypto services through a new partnership with digital assets bank Sygnum.
articles.title: Swiss Bank PostFinance to Roll Out Bitcoin, Ethereum Services for Clients

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: With Ethereum’s next upgrade just around the corner, ETH and tokens powering liquid staking platforms are soaring.
articles.title: Ethereum, LSD Tokens on the Rise Ahead of Next Week's Shanghai Upgrade

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: The digital identity system lays the foundation for a metaverse “truly capable of servicing the global population.”
articles.title: Tron Launches Dominica Metaverse Bound Token With Huobi

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: The Shanghai fork will implement EIP-4895, which allows validators to withdraw ETH that have been staked since as long ago as December 2020.
articles.title: What Is Ethereum’s Shanghai Upgrade?

articles.description: Move over, DeFi—ReFi is coming? Gitcoin founder Kevin Owocki has stepped away from DeFi grant-giving machine Gitcoin as it fully decentralizes and is now focused on regenerative finance (huh?) and ReFi incubator Supermodular. He aims to "regenerate the regenerators." He explained it all to Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly, and also talks DAO structure, crypto factions, NFT use cases, his book "Greenpilled," and much more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Kevin Owocki Wants to Regenerate DeFi

articles.description: Aurory executive producer and head of production Jonathan Campeau tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC about how the first-generation of Web3 games came out of DeFi and are now evolving.
articles.title: Why Aurory's Head of Production Left Ubisoft for Web3

articles.description: With roughly 50 video games in its pipeline, Gala Games is all-in on Web3. Gala's President of Blockchain Jason Brink told Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC about the studio's ethos and weighs in on the different approaches to Web3 gaming.
articles.title: 'We Don't Really Do the Corporate Thing Very Well' Says Jason Brink on Gala Games Approach

articles.description: Paul Grewal is the Chief Legal Officer at Coinbase and a former U.S. magistrate judge in Northern California. He gave Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott his candid takes on Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX, the SEC's crackdown on staking, the sanctioning of Tornado Cash, and more alpha on how Coinbase is approaching the current unfriendly US regulatory environment. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Coinbase's Top Lawyer Gets Real on SEC

articles.description: Rotten Tomatoes founder Patrick Lee, who has led companies at the intersection of technology and entertainment from Web1 to Web3, spoke to Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Outer Edge LA about the current state of decentralized gaming, film and television.
articles.title: The Founder of Rotten Tomatoes Says Web3 Entertainment Isn’t Nearly Entertaining Enough Yet

articles.description: Gnosis first launched in 2015 as a decentralized prediction market built on Ethereum. Now it's a DAO, a multi-sig wallet, a staking chain, and a vibrant community with its own GNO governance token. Co-founder and COO Friederike Ernst talked to Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott about the careful evolution of Gnosis, decentralization impostors, account abstraction, DeFi UX failures, why Ethereum is the "Manhattan of crypto," and much more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: How Gnosis Has Endured and Evolved

articles.description: Justin Aversano, best known for his high-selling "Twin Flames" NFT photo series, joined Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward ahead of the upcoming L.A. exhibition for his new Ethereum NFT project "Smoke and Mirrors." He shared the wild inspiration behind the tarot-themed collection, and why—despite his growing profile—he opted not to exhibit at a major brand-name gallery.
articles.title: Justin Aversano's Inspiration for Tarot-Themed NFT Photo Series 'Smoke and Mirrors'

articles.description: Former "Call of Duty" developer Rob Bowling, now head of Midnight Society Studio, checked in with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC and shared some behind-the-scenes statistics on how players are enjoying "Deadrop." The game saw 90,000 player hours over the weekend, with 97 minutes average play time per player, and their community size tripled in just a few days.
articles.title: Midnight Society’s Rob Bowling Talks Deadrop Launch and Working With Dr. Disrespect

articles.description: On this panel from NFT Paris 2023 moderated by Decrypt's Dan Roberts, Web3 leads from some of the largest consumer and tech brands discuss their NFT strategies. Marc Mathieu of Salesforce, Tim Walther of VW Group, Eva Assayag of Panerai, and Samir Addamine of Absolute Labs joined the panel.
articles.title: Big Brands Get Serious About NFTs: Salesforce, VW, Panerai, Absolute Labs at NFT Paris

articles.description: At NFT Paris 2023, Decrypt’s Stephen Graves moderated a discussion about NFTs and the entertainment industry with Warner Bros’ NFT head Josh Hackbarth, CyberBrokers founder Josie Bellini, NFT Now founder Matt Medved and Dave Broome, CEO of Orange Comet, which has produced NFTs for Anthony Hopkins and The Walking Dead.
articles.title: NFT Entertainment Revolution: Warner Bros, Orange Comet, CyberBrokers and NFT Now at NFT Paris

articles.description: Knights Who Say Nah co-founder and project lead Nick Richey chats with Decrypt's Jason Nelson inside the group's armory of artifacts, shows off a historic Japanese tanto sword, and discusses why the preservation of historical artifacts is the best use case for NFTs.
articles.title: Step Inside the Armory of the NFT Collective 'Knights Who Say Nah'
